## Validation Checklist

- [ ] `id` matches filename for each updated `.mdx` file
- [ ] Dates are in `YYYY-MM-DD`
- [ ] Frontmatter status is valid (`draft`, `review`, or `validated`)
- [ ] Related module IDs and map IDs are valid
- [ ] `npm run content:check` passes locally (if running locally)
